description.value: You increase the frequency of Mummy's Despair to once per 10 minutes instead of once per hour. A creature that critically fails its Will saving throw is @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Paralyzed]{Paralyzed} for 1 round instead of @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 2}. Mummy's Despair gains the incapacitation trait.
